      • getPathName

        public java.lang.String getPathName()
        Returns the PWS normalised node name for this tree node. The primary sense of this is for nodes which represent a GROUP identifier (hence are DIRECTORY nodes). The returned value is intended to correspond to a GROUP field value.
        Returns:
        String, normalised node name

      • getTreePath

        public javax.swing.tree.TreePath getTreePath()

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(TreeHandler.PwsTreeNode obj)
        Compares this node's user object to the parameter node's user object. Both objects are compared to their String (toString()) representation.
        Parameters:
        obj -
        Returns:
        0 = equal; lesser 0 = this is lesser than param; greater 0 = this is greater than param

      • getDescendantDirIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<TreeHandler.PwsTreeNode> getDescendantDirIterator(boolean expanded)
        Returns an Iterator over directory nodes under this directory node, including any depth subdirectories. The set of directories is determined by parameter. Returns null if this is not a directory node.
        Parameters:
        expanded - boolean, if true only expanded directories are listed, if false all directories are listed
        Returns:
        Iterator of type PwsTreeNode or null
